Description

Filter for authorizing requests based on JWT tokens.

The LoginController class handles user authentication requests.

REST controller for managing products in the e-commerce platform.

Implementation of the IProductRepository interface that provides methods to interact with the product data source.

Service for managing products in the system.

Controller responsible for user registration operations.

Service responsible for handling user registration.

Service responsible for handling file uploads and deletions.

Controller that manages user-related requests such as saving and retrieving user data.
